title: Anomaly 2 - Mac App Store
description:
As I couldn't find a copy of this game for Mac anywhere other than file upload sites that required premium accounts, I decided to buy it direct from the Mac App Store.

Thought I'd upload and share here for anyone else who was looking for it, like I was.

As my first upload, let me know how it is for you.

Works fine for me on Mountain Lion 10.8.3



--------------------------------------------------



Name: Anomaly 2

Developer: 11 bit studios s.a.

Version: 1.0

Released: June 06 2013

File format: .dmg

Size: 2.52 GB (final)

Language: English
